title: Emmerdale spoilers: Cain turns his back on Faith tonight after Cara and Nate bombshell
text:
Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) was left devastated in Emmerdale when he discovered that wife Moira (Natalie J Robb) had been having an affair with farmhand Nate Robinson (Jurrell Carter). However, matters were made much worse when he found out that Nate was his biological son — and Faith (Sally Dexter) knew of his existence.

After discovering Moira’s affair via Faith’s meddling, Cain set about seeking revenge — and he succeeded in getting said revenge when he got into a physical altercation with Nate on a boat. However, the bombshell that he wasn’t prepared for is that Nate’s actually his son.

With the boat having gone up in flames, Nate and Moira ended up in hospital and, last night, viewers saw Cain unable to forgive his wife for everything that has transpired.

However, Faith’s odd behaviour was a cause for concern, and before long it came to light that she had some knowledge of Nate’s existence — and had prevented mum Cara from getting in touch with him.

Cain struggled to process the news, and tonight, it becomes apparent that he holds Faith responsible for the whole thing — affair included.

Cain and Faith have always had a strained relationship, but the pair had been getting along better lately than they’ve ever done before, but this revelation could prove to be the end for them.

What’s more, we know that actress Sally will be departing from Emmerdale soon, which means that Faith will be leaving, so could Cain’s feelings towards his mum over keeping Nate’s existence a secret perhaps prove instrumental in the character’s impending exit?

Emmerdale continues Friday 25thOctober at 7pm.

description: Cain was devastated to learn that Nate is his son, but it's Faith he holds responsible and, tonight, he lets her know how he really feels.
